objective: Reach 98% unit test pass rate (2,966/3,027 tests)

fixes_applied.description: Missing navigator.storage mock setup and restore logic
fixes_applied.root_cause: Test deleted global.navigator.storage to test fallback behavior but never restored it, breaking all subsequent tests

strategy: Focused on Category A (Quick Wins) - Found and fixed root cause affecting multiple tests
